div.ab: zōt ud rāspīg: ms. 40. Cf. VrS97.1, VVrS97.1, VytVrS97.1.

Parallels.ab: yeŋ́hē.hātąmca hufrāiiaštąm ~ VrS2.14, VrS17.13, VrS77.13 yeŋ́hē.hātąm hufrāiiaštąm.

Nerangs.ab: ēn gyāg ō pāy ēstišn rāspīg dast pad pādyāb bē kunišn pad gāh frabardārān šawišn abāg zōt abastāg bē gōwišn ahunəm vairīm ...
"At this passage, (the zōt) has to stand up. The rāspīg has to wash his hands with pādyāb, to go to the place of the frabardārān and to recite the abastāg with the zōt: ahunəm vairīm ..."
